DOC.brief_summary: Measurement of bone length in subjects diagnosed with kyphosis and scoliosis using the Lunar iDXA x-ray scan.
DOC.brief_title: Cobb Angle Measurement of Kyphosis and Scoliosis
DOC.detailed_description: To determine if bone density scanning (DEXA) and the use of a computer software program can make accurate measurements of the curvature(s) of the spine (Cobb angle)in patients with kyphosis and scoliosis compared to x-rays of the spine.
DOC.criteria: 18 years of age Have Kyphosis or Scoliosis Have had an xray of the spine performed within 3 months time Are unwilling to read and sign this document Are pregnant or if you have not had a negative pregnancy test just prior to the iDXA scan. Have severe deformities of your back Unable to lay on the scanning table for the scan
